EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject:: {!Case.Subject} Case #: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Thank you for contacting Bendixking. Your case tracking number for this RMA inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Please note that this is not an authorization to return product to BendixKing.
BendixKing will need the following information to evaluate your request
· Original PO number
· Part Number and Quantity
· Serial number if present
· Detailed reason for request to return
· Picture of the part and packaging (if available)
Thank you, we appreciate your business!
BendixKing
ref: Case Creation Acknowlegement
